mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message ( message_id , merchant_id , message_status , title , content , sender , sender_name , create_at , receiver , receiver_name , change_at ) VALUES ( #{messageId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{merchantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{messageStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{content, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} , #{sender, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{receiver, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{receiverName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{changeAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
